home_job: Frontend developer, UI/UX designer, freelancer, Github addict.
about_desc: Hello there, my name is Sirojiddin Nurmanov and i love doing stuff for internet espacially open-source projects. My love for the development started when i was 22. Now, i mainly develop web apps, i'm open to new opportunities.Despite the fact that I started programming quite late, I believe that I can achieve great results and I am ready for everything. Consistency beats talent!!! I am willing to work twice as hard
experience_0_overview: s-mart.uz is an association of several developers and we are engaged in the production of web applications. Saadia.uz, created by us, is the first Telegram web app store in Uzbekistan.
experience_1_overview: Vapoter.tn is an e-commerce website that sells anything in relation with vapes. unfortunately, Tunisia has a restricted system and it's now forbidden to sell vape products. so, the website closed.
projects_2_overview: Niners is the website of the Niners Learning Center
projects_3_overview: Nsmedical is a web application of the Neuro Service clinic in Tashkent
projects_1_extended_overview: Tezoz.uz is a web page. In it, instructions for rapid weight loss and necessary products were given.
projects_2_extended_overview: Niners is the website of the Niners Training Center. It provides news and information about the educational center.
projects_3_extended_overview: Nsmedical is a web application of the Neuro Service clinic in Tashkent. This web page contains Nevro service online services and news.
projects_4_extended_overview: saadia.uz is an online market. It can work both as a web page and as a telegram bot.
